properties.description: Configure which claim will be used to build GrantedAuthority, and prefix of the GrantedAuthority's string value. Default value is: "scp" -> "SCOPE_", "roles" -> "APPROLE_". Example: If use the default value, and the access_token's "scp" scope value is "testValue", then GrantedAuthority with "SCOPE_testValue" will be created.

properties.name: spring.cloud.azure.active-directory.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Azure Active Directory related auto-configuration.

properties.description: Whether to enable Azure Active Directory B2C related auto-configuration.

properties.name: spring.cloud.azure.cosmos.throttling-retry-options.max-retry-attempts-on-throttled-requests
properties.description: Maximum number of retries in the case where the request fails because the service has applied rate limiting on the client.

properties.name: spring.cloud.azure.cosmos.throttling-retry-options.max-retry-wait-time
properties.description: Maximum retry time in seconds. When a request fails due to a throttle error, the service sends back a response that contains a value indicating the client should not retry before the time period has elapsed (Retry-After). The MaxRetryWaitTime flag allows the application to set a maximum wait time for all retry attempts. If the cumulative wait time exceeds the MaxRetryWaitTime, the SDK will stop retrying and return the error to the application.

properties.name: spring.jms.servicebus.pool.block-if-full
properties.description: Whether to block when a connection is requested and the pool is full. Set it to false to throw a 'JMSException' instead.

properties.name: spring.jms.servicebus.pool.block-if-full-timeout
properties.description: Blocking period before throwing an exception if the pool is still full.

properties.name: spring.jms.servicebus.pool.enabled
properties.description: Whether a JmsPoolConnectionFactory should be created, instead of a regular ConnectionFactory.

properties.name: spring.jms.servicebus.pool.idle-timeout
properties.description: Connection idle timeout.

properties.name: spring.jms.servicebus.pool.max-connections
properties.description: Maximum number of pooled connections.

properties.name: spring.jms.servicebus.pool.max-sessions-per-connection
properties.description: Maximum number of pooled sessions per connection in the pool.

properties.name: spring.jms.servicebus.pool.time-between-expiration-check
properties.description: Time to sleep between runs of the idle connection eviction thread. When negative, no idle connection eviction thread runs.

properties.name: spring.jms.servicebus.pool.use-anonymous-producers
properties.description: Whether to use only one anonymous 'MessageProducer' instance. Set it to false to create one 'MessageProducer' every time one is required.

values.description: The prefix for the authority started with 'SCOPE_'.
The prefix for the authority started with 'APPROLE_'.
If included, the app skips the email-based discovery process that user goes through on the sign-in page, leading to a slightly more streamlined user experience.
You can use this parameter to pre-fill the username and email address field of the sign-in page for the user.
Indicates the type of user interaction that is required. Valid values are login, none, consent, and select_account.
